phases.phase_name: Robot approaches and grips the towel
phases.description: The robotic arm moves downward and positions its gripper above a folded green towel on a wooden table. The gripper closes around the towel, securing it.

phases.phase_name: Robot lifts and adjusts the towel
phases.description: The robotic arm lifts the towel slightly, then repositions it on the table, adjusting its orientation to ensure it is properly aligned. The gripper remains engaged throughout.

phases.phase_name: Robot releases the towel and retracts
phases.description: The robotic arm releases the towel, allowing it to rest on the table. The gripper opens, and the arm begins to retract upward, moving away from the towel.

summary: The robot approaches a folded green towel on a table, grips it, adjusts its position, and then releases it before retracting.
